name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-msgraph-extension
title: Manage Microsoft Graph Open Extension in SPFx
shortDescription: This sample shows how to managed Microsoft Graph Open Extension in SPFX. This application uses User Resource to create Open Extension.
longDescription: This sample shows how to managed Microsoft Graph Open Extension in SPFX. This application uses User Resource to create Open Extension.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
